01.name: Web Development Service
01.briefDescription: Learn to build modern web applications using React.
overview: This course covers the basics of web development.
You will learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.
By the end of the course, you will build your own web application.
objectives: Build dynamic web applications using React.

02.name: Data Science Bootcamp
02.briefDescription: Master data analysis, visualization, and machine learning techniques.
overview: Learn Python, data manipulation, and data visualization.
Dive into machine learning and build predictive models.
Understand how to work with large datasets and perform data analysis.
objectives: Gain proficiency in Python for data science.
Learn to clean and visualize data effectively.
Understand machine learning algorithms and how to implement them.

03.name: Digital Marketing Essentials
03.briefDescription: Learn digital marketing strategies to grow businesses online.
overview: Understand the fundamentals of SEO, SEM, and social media marketing.
Learn how to create effective marketing campaigns.
Gain skills in email marketing, content marketing, and analytics.
objectives: Develop a comprehensive digital marketing strategy.
Learn to use SEO and SEM to improve online visibility.
Create engaging content for social media and digital platforms.

04.name: Graphic Design Masterclass
04.briefDescription: Learn to design stunning graphics using modern tools and software.
overview: Understand the principles of graphic design.
Learn to use software like Photoshop, Illustrator, and Canva.
Create logos, banners, and other marketing materials.
objectives: Master graphic design tools and techniques.
Create visually appealing designs for various media.
